  • Classes in org.atmosphere.annotation used by org.atmosphere.annotation 
    Class and Description
    Processor
    Class annotated with AtmosphereAnnotation must implement this interface in order to get invoked when the AtmosphereFramework.init() execute.
    Suspend.SCOPE

  • Classes in org.atmosphere.annotation used by org.atmosphere.samples.chat.jersey 
    Class and Description
    Broadcast
    Broadcast to all suspended response the value of the method annotated with this annotation.
    Suspend
    Suspend the underlying response.
  • Classes in org.atmosphere.annotation used by org.atmosphere.samples.multirequest.handlers

    Broadcast to all suspended response the value of the method annotated with this annotation.
  • Classes in org.atmosphere.annotation used by org.atmosphere.samples.pubsub 
    Class and Description
    Asynchronous
    Suspend the response and use the Broadcaster associated with HeaderConfig.X_ATMOSPHERE_TRACKING_ID to publish the result.
    Broadcast
    Broadcast to all suspended response the value of the method annotated with this annotation.
    Publish
    When a method is annotated with this annotation, the returned value of the method will be broadcasted to the passed value, e.g the associated Broadcaster.broadcast(Object) will be invoked.
    Schedule
    Schedule periodic broadcast operations to the set of suspended response.
    Subscribe
    Subscribe to the "value", or topic.
    Suspend
    Suspend the underlying response.
